name: Raise A Floppa
description:
Raise A Floppa!                                                                                                                                                     

Take  care of your cute Floppa! Feed him food and buy whatever he wants! Be sure not to make Floppa go hungry or he DIES! Their are also other cool stuff in the shop you can buy! But why stop there? You can go outside, fish for fish, and get Ms. Floppa and Bingus! There are also other characters available for purchase! Bug your roomate for rent, bingus collects your cash, and Ms. Floppa GIVES YOU 2X CASH! You can also PLANT crops and harvest them for MONEY and you can FERTILIZE the CROPS! You can also buy a milk bowl for Floppa and feed him MILK!

New Updates To Come!
